archdesc.bioghist: Fathers' rights movement activist; president of the Washtenaw/Livingston County Chapter of Fathers for Equal Rights, and member of the National Congress for Fathers and Children.
archdesc.scopecontent: Resume; newspaper clippings, writings, and correspondence about his custody battle for his son; newsletters, articles, correspondence, and other materials from his involvement in Fathers for Equal Rights (Michigan chapters) and the National Congress for Men and Children, Michigan Chapter.

corpname.primary_name: National Congress for Men and Children
